trans-unit.source: Specifies the valid values for controlling the location of the output-cached HTTP response for a resource.
trans-unit.target: 指定有效值，以控制資源輸出快取 HTTP 回應的位置。

trans-unit.source: The values specified by this enumeration are used when you include an `@ OutputCache` directive in an .aspx file.
trans-unit.target: 指定由這個列舉值可用時您包含`@ OutputCache`.aspx 檔案中的指示詞。

trans-unit.source: These values determine the cache location for page output.
trans-unit.target: 這些值決定頁面輸出快取位置。
如需詳細資訊，請參閱[快取的 ASP.NET 網頁](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9666a1b-88df-4931-af0b-a754fc65660b)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how the Server value is used to specify that the page should be cached on the Web server where the request is processed.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用伺服器值是指定應該在網頁伺服器上快取頁面則處理該要求。

trans-unit.source: The output cache can be located on the browser client (where the request originated), on a proxy server (or any other server) participating in the request, or on the server where the request was processed.
trans-unit.target: 輸出快取可以位在瀏覽器用戶端 (要求的來源)、參予要求的 Proxy 伺服器 (或任何其他的伺服器) 或要求已處理的所在伺服器上。

trans-unit.source: This value corresponds to the <see cref="F:System.Web.HttpCacheability.Public" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 這個值對應於 <see cref="F:System.Web.HttpCacheability.Public" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The output cache is located on the browser client where the request originated.
trans-unit.target: 輸出快取位在要求所來自的瀏覽器用戶端。

trans-unit.source: This value corresponds to the <see cref="F:System.Web.HttpCacheability.Private" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 這個值對應於 <see cref="F:System.Web.HttpCacheability.Private" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The output cache can be stored in any HTTP 1.1 cache-capable devices other than the origin server.
trans-unit.target: 輸出快取可以儲存在任何 HTTP 1.1 快取功能裝置中，而不可以儲存在來源伺服器中。

trans-unit.source: This includes proxy servers and the client that made the request.
trans-unit.target: 這包含 Proxy 伺服器和提出要求的用戶端。

trans-unit.source: The output cache is disabled for the requested page.
trans-unit.target: 輸出快取會針對要求的頁面停用。

trans-unit.source: This value corresponds to the <see cref="F:System.Web.HttpCacheability.NoCache" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 這個值對應於 <see cref="F:System.Web.HttpCacheability.NoCache" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The output cache is located on the Web server where the request was processed.
trans-unit.target: 輸出快取位在要求已處理的 Web 伺服器上。

trans-unit.source: This value corresponds to the <see cref="F:System.Web.HttpCacheability.Server" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 這個值對應於 <see cref="F:System.Web.HttpCacheability.Server" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The output cache can be stored only at the origin server or at the requesting client.
trans-unit.target: 輸出快取只可以儲存在原始伺服器或提出要求的用戶端。

trans-unit.source: Proxy servers are not allowed to cache the response.
trans-unit.target: Proxy 伺服器不能快取回應。

trans-unit.source: This value corresponds to the combination of the <see cref="F:System.Web.HttpCacheability.Private" /> and <see cref="F:System.Web.HttpCacheability.Server" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 這個值對應於 <see cref="F:System.Web.HttpCacheability.Private" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Web.HttpCacheability.Server" /> 列舉值的組合。
